articles.content: The government and the telcos are rushing to commercially launch 5G services at the earliest, but any significant uptake in the roll out can only be expected around December, say industry executives.… [+2510 chars]

articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: Jio adds 4.22 million users in June; Vi’s user base shrinks further - The Economic Times
articles.description: By comparison, Bharti Airtel added a modest 0.79 million wireless users, taking its gross user base to 362.96 million while Vodafone Ideas customer losses continued. Cash-strapped Vi lost 1.8 million mobile customers in June, shrinking its user base further t…
articles.content: Jio Infocomm stole a march over its two older rivals, adding a whopping 4.22 million mobile phone users in June, taking its subscriber base to 413.01 million, indicating that its prolonged clean-up o… [+1991 chars]

articles.author: Avdhut Bagkar
articles.title: SBI Cards eyes record high on Golden Cross breakout, may rally up to 16% - Business Standard
articles.description: SBI Cards has conquered the 200DMA a prime indicator of the trend for market participants and hints of a likely Golden Cross breakout with 50DMA and 100DMA likely to cross the 200DMA
articles.content: Business Standard has always strived hard to provide up-to-date information and commentary on developments that are of interest to you and have wider political and economic implications for the count… [+1029 chars]
